name: buio
title: Buio
desc: A bold SaaS template for serious Web3 teams.
article:
Buio is a dark-mode SaaS theme built for next-gen products. With a sharp layout, glowing aesthetic, and built-in structure, it's ready to help you launch confidently in the Web3 space.


  • Learn more about Buio
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing Page x2
  • Pricing Page x2
  • Blog (CC)
  • Jobs (CC)
  • Teams (CC)
  • Changelog (CC)
  • Customers (CC)
  • Help center (CC)
  • Legal pages (CC)
  • Integrations (CC)
  • Status
  • Contact
  • Sign in
  • Sign up
  • Error 404


(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • AOS Animations
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
